price: 36. Ir Firaun (Faroanas) sakė: „O Haman, pastatyk man bokštą, kad galėčiau atvykti keliais -
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ ٱبۡنِ لِي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَبۡلُغُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu yāhāmānu ib'ni lī ṣarḥan laʿallī ablughu al-asbāba
